name: B&G Foods, Inc.
description: B&G Foods, Inc. is a prominent packaged foods company that specializes in the production and marketing of a diverse range of food products. Founded in 1996, B&G Foods has grown through strategic acquisitions and the development of a robust portfolio of well-known brands. The company is recognized for its commitment to quality and innovation, offering products that cater to a variety of consumer preferences. Their extensive product lineup includes popular brands such as Green Giant, Mrs. Dash, and Ortega, which provide consumers with convenient and flavorful meal solutions. B&G Foods operates in multiple categories, including frozen vegetables, spices, and condiments, making it a versatile player in the food industry. The company's mission is to provide high-quality, affordable food products that meet the needs of today’s consumers, while also focusing on sustainability and responsible sourcing. B&G Foods is dedicated to maintaining strong relationships with its suppliers and customers, ensuring that its products are accessible to households across North America. With a growing emphasis on health-conscious options, B&G Foods continues to innovate and adapt to changing market dynamics, striving to enhance its product offerings and expand its consumer base.

seo.meta_title: B&G Foods, Inc. | Quality Packaged Food Products
seo.meta_description: Explore B&G Foods, Inc., a leader in the packaged foods industry with a diverse range of quality brands. Discover their commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What does B&G Foods do?
faq.answer: B&G Foods produces and markets a wide range of packaged food products, including frozen vegetables and condiments.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of B&G Foods?
faq.answer: Casey Keller is the CEO of B&G Foods, Inc.

faq.question: Where is B&G Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: B&G Foods is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are some of B&G Foods' main brands?
faq.answer: B&G Foods' main brands include Green Giant, Ortega, and Mrs. Dash.
